meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Chris Frantz Rebecca Zoshak Lisa Mueller Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7723.

td.p: Chris Frantz, an on-call office administrator from Orwigsburg, Pennsylvania
Rebecca Zoshak, a language specialist from State College, Pennsylvania
Lisa Mueller, a technical services librarian from Naperville, Illinois (whose 2-day cash winnings total $33,200)

tr.td: SENIOR MOMENTS
5-LETTER WORDS
NOT-SO-SERIOUS LAWS
NEWSPAPERS
I'VE SEEN THE LIGHTS GO OUT ON BROADWAY
MIX -OLOGY
(Alex: We will ask you to decipher an anagram, and keep in mind that each correct response will end in "O-L-O-G-Y".)

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
